settings.subtitle: MATERIALS
settings.title: We care about quality
settings.text: All of our goods were created from the finest materials with exceptional attention to detail and a unique combination of colors, textures and styles. Our leitmotiv is to include on our catalog the products with the most beautiful aesthetics and also an unbelievable performance to make you find the pleasure of camping in nature.

settings.subtitle: PROXIMITY
settings.title: Locally made
settings.text: Our factories, all located in a local environment, have a long tradition of more than 40 years in the outdoor sector. We promote local economy. Expert hands are commissioned by artisan methods and taking care of the smallest detail of manufacturing our products. Our suppliers are also in our area. This condition helps us reduce our CO2 emissions while being in control of our raw materials and suppliers.

settings.subtitle: SUSTAINABILITY
settings.title: Focused on nature
settings.text: We select fabrics that demonstrate an ongoing commitment to reduce environmental impact. Organic, recycled and eco-friendly. We donâ€™t use virgin oil-based fabrics. Sustainability lies at the very heart of what we do.

settings.title: Our quality promise
settings.richtext: Quality is never an accident. It is always the result of intelligent effort. We spend most of our time and energy for good design and to achieve high quality. Every single detail from material to technique is thought through with obsessive attention. If our product doesn't satisfy you, we'll take it back.
